mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.theme_id AS themeId, a.image_url AS imageUrl, a.create_time AS createTime, a.author, at.title AS themeTitle FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_theme at on a.theme_id = at.id LIMIT #{startSize}, #{pageSize}
